Structs/LogTag.html#/s:8INLogger6LogTagV.name: state
Structs/LogTag.html#/s:8INLogger6LogTagV.abstract: The log tag’s state, i.e. if this tag is disabled or enabled.

Structs/LogEntry.html#/s:8INLogger8LogEn.name: file
Structs/LogEntry.html#/s:8INLogger8LogEn.abstract: The file’s name where the log has been called.

Structs/LogEntry.html#/s:8INLogger8LogEn.name: function

Structs/LogEntry.html#/s:8INLogger8LogEn.name: line

Structs/LogEntry.html#/s:8INLogger8LogEn.name: message
Structs/LogEntry.html#/s:8INLogger8LogEn.abstract: The log’s message text as a plain text.

Structs/LogEntry.html#/s:8INLogger8LogEn.name: level
Structs/LogEntry.html#/s:8INLogger8LogEn.abstract: A log level indicating the severity of the message.

Structs/LogEntry.html#/s:8INLogger8LogEn.name: tags
Structs/LogEntry.html#/s:8INLogger8LogEn.abstract: The log tags associated to that log message.

Structs/LogEntry.html#/s:8INLogger8LogEn.name: date

Structs/LogEntry.html#/s:8INLogger8LogEn.name: additionalData
Structs/LogEntry.html#/s:8INLogger8LogEn.abstract: Any additional information can be passed here.

Structs/LogEntry.html.name: LogEntry
Structs/LogEntry.html.abstract: A log message wrapped in a struct to make it easier

Structs/LogPipeline.html.abstract: A concrete pipeline implementation for the Logger is a combination of a

Structs/LogTag.html.name: LogTag
Structs/LogTag.html.abstract: A tag which can be used to mark log messages.

Protocols/LogWriter.html#/s:8INLogger9Lo.name: write(_:)
Protocols/LogWriter.html#/s:8INLogger9Lo.abstract: Writes the formatted log message string where it belongs to.

Protocols/LogFilter.html.abstract: The interface to any log filter which determines if a log message

Protocols/LogFormatter.html.abstract: The interface to any log formatter which is responsible to bring a log entry

Protocols/LogWriter.html.abstract: The interface for any log writer which is responsible

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS8INLoggerE16.abstract: Returns the last path component of this string.

Enums/LogTagState.html#/s:8INLogger11Log.name: disabled
Enums/LogTagState.html#/s:8INLogger11Log.abstract: The tag is disabled, meaning a log statement with such a tag should be

Enums/LogTagState.html#/s:8INLogger11Log.abstract: The tag is active, meaning a log statement with such a tag should be logged.

Enums/LogTagState.html#/s:8INLogger11Log.name: forceDisabled
Enums/LogTagState.html#/s:8INLogger11Log.abstract: The tag is disabled, meaning a log statement with such a tag is filtered out
Returns true if both states are the same enum case, otherwise false.

Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:8INLogger8LogLeve.name: debug
Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:8INLogger8LogLeve.abstract: A message which typically should only be logged during development and thus not

Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:8INLogger8LogLeve.name: info
Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:8INLogger8LogLeve.abstract: An info message which provides some general information and which will be logged

Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:8INLogger8LogLeve.name: warn
Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:8INLogger8LogLeve.abstract: A waning indicating that something didn’t went the happy path, but not totally wrong either,

Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:8INLogger8LogLeve.name: error
Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:8INLogger8LogLeve.abstract: An error message indicating that something has gone totally wrong, but we still might recover

Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:8INLogger8LogLeve.name: fatal
Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:8INLogger8LogLeve.abstract: A fatal error from which it’s not possible to recover and thus most likely leads to a crash

Enums/LogTagState.html.abstract: The active state of a LogTag defining whether a log statement should be logged

Classes/FileLogWriter/LogFileType.html#/.name: logFile
Classes/FileLogWriter/LogFileType.html#/.abstract: Points to the current log file, therefore, only the log file’s content is returned.

Classes/FileLogWriter/LogFileType.html#/.name: backupFile
Classes/FileLogWriter/LogFileType.html#/.abstract: Points to the backup file, therefore, only the backup file’s content is returned.

Classes/FileLogWriter.html#/s:8INLogger1.name: defaultLogFileName
Classes/FileLogWriter.html#/s:8INLogger1.abstract: The default file name for the log file.

Classes/FileLogWriter.html#/s:8INLogger1.name: defaultBackupName
Classes/FileLogWriter.html#/s:8INLogger1.abstract: The default file name for the rotating backup file.

Classes/FileLogWriter.html#/s:8INLogger1.name: fileFolder
Classes/FileLogWriter.html#/s:8INLogger1.abstract: The folder where to save the log and backup file.

Classes/FileLogWriter.html#/s:8INLogger1.name: backupFilePath
Classes/FileLogWriter.html#/s:8INLogger1.abstract: The URL to the rotating backup log file.

Classes/FileLogWriter/LogFileType.html.name: LogFileType
Classes/FileLogWriter/LogFileType.html.abstract: Points to a specific log file type and defines what to return

Classes/FileLogWriter.html#/s:8INLogger1.name: contentOfLog(fileType:)
Classes/FileLogWriter.html#/s:8INLogger1.abstract: Returns the content of the log file.

Classes/SimpleLogEntryCreator.html.name: SimpleLogEntryCreator
Classes/SimpleLogEntryCreator.html.abstract: A log creator which doesn’t determines the thread number because it might take some time to process.

Classes/DevelopmentLogFilter.html.name: DevelopmentLogFilter
Classes/DevelopmentLogFilter.html.abstract: A typical development log filter which doesn’t filter out anything,

Classes/ReleaseLogFilter.html.name: ReleaseLogFilter
Classes/ReleaseLogFilter.html.abstract: A release log filter which filters out all debug logs,

Classes/DevelopLogFormatter.html.name: DevelopLogFormatter
Classes/DevelopLogFormatter.html.abstract: A log formatter suitable for development which shows only the log level,

Classes/FileLogFormatter.html.name: FileLogFormatter
Classes/FileLogFormatter.html.abstract: A log formatter which prints more details about the log message than the DevelopLogFormatter.

Classes/SimpleLogFormatter.html.name: SimpleLogFormatter
Classes/SimpleLogFormatter.html.abstract: A simple log formatter which only passes the message to the output string, ignoring the rest.

Classes/ConsoleLogWriter.html.name: ConsoleLogWriter
Classes/ConsoleLogWriter.html.abstract: A log writer which prints any log messages to the console

Classes/FileLogWriter.html.name: FileLogWriter
Classes/FileLogWriter.html.abstract: A log writer specific for log files used by the Logger‘s pipeline.

Classes/Logger.html.name: Logger
Classes/Logger.html.abstract: A logger for collecting debug or other info messages in code and to process them
